document_data.caption: Map showing the location of the Dancing Dell, c. 1485 DR.
document_data.name: Dancing Dell
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dancing Dell''' was a dell containing the [[Ladystone]], a sacred stone touched by [[Eilistraee]]. The stone was very old, possibly dating back as far as the early settlements of [[Ardeep]].<ref>{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The dell was a smooth [[bowl]]-shaped valley filled with [[moss]], [[fern]]s, and [[grass]]es,{{Cite dragon/270/The New Adventures of Volo: The Ardeep|95}}
document_data.Defenses: The Ladystone's power guarded the dell and could strike out at intruders at the will of the goddess or her priestesses.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Qilue Veladorn]] sometimes lead worship at the Ladystone.
document_data.History: It was said that Eilistraee had manifested in the dell more than once.
